system.description: Effect: The user selects a Movement Type they possess and make a Skill Check with that Movement Type's associated Skill. On a success, the user gains +1m per 2 DoS to that Movement Score for the rest of the round (default 0 at 1 DoS). The user may elect to spend up to 6 PP to increase the number of DoS by the number of PP spent.

actions.name: Rush
actions.description: Effect: The user selects a Movement Type they possess and make a Skill Check with that Movement Type's associated Skill. On a success, the user gains +1m per 2 DoS to that Movement Score for the rest of the round (default 0 at 1 DoS). The user may elect to spend up to 6 PP to increase the number of DoS by the number of PP spent.
